"I want to say something about this, since we're talking about the Supreme Court and what's at stake. We've had eight discussions before, this is our ninth, "Said Clinton. "We didn't have one question about women's right to make their own decisions about reproductive health care, not one." The line got a big applause from the audience. But was it true?
